name: Ultimate Theatre Mode
additional_info:
Supplied as is.
Credits to Crtlas Atlas and Crispy Frank.
Lifted code from their styles whilst trying to understand VL elements etc and create one for personal use that I thought I'd share

This has been created to: - 

1. View Missymovies
2. On a 50 inch monitor
3. Address issues with Theatre view
4. Beautify a few things

The only manual thing left is font increase once put into Theatre mode which is a personal choice, Huge being ap refernce.

On point 3 - not being able to see IM's on theatre mode has always bugged me so I've made that and what I feel are the essential
icons visible above the chat window

So that's it. It's basically just a Tuurbo Dark Mode in Theatre View


Thanks

BeanCounter
